Class ExcelWriter

Object
ExcelWriter
public class ExcelWriter extends Object
Utility for saving user credentials, applications, projects, and enquiries into an Excel file for persistence. Depends on Apache POI.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Javier

      private static final String filePath
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • ExcelWriter

      public ExcelWriter()

  • Method Details

    • setDateCellStyle

      private static CellStyle setDateCellStyle(Workbook workbook)
      Creates a cell style for formatting dates as "d/M/yyyy" in Excel.
      Parameters:
      workbook - The Excel workbook to create the style for.
      Returns:
      The configured CellStyle.

    • updateUserPassword

      public static void updateUserPassword(User user, String newPassword)
      Updates the password of a user in the corresponding Excel sheet based on their role. The password is persisted directly into the Excel file used for login.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose password is being updated.
      newPassword - The new password to store.

    • exportApplications

      public static void exportApplications()
      Exports all submitted applications to the "FlatBookings" sheet in the Excel file. If the sheet exists, it is cleared and rewritten with updated data.

    • exportProjects

      public static void exportProjects()
      Exports all project listings to the "ProjectListings" sheet in the Excel file. Includes flat type breakdowns, officer assignments, and visibility status.

    • exportEnquiries

      public static void exportEnquiries()
      Exports all user enquiries and replies to the "Enquiries" sheet in the Excel file.

    • saveData

      public static void saveData()
      Performs a complete export of applications, projects, and enquiries. Called during system shutdown to persist all in-memory data.
